special_text:
During your turn, creatures you control have first strike and vigilance.
[-2]: Destroy target tapped creature.
rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
If an opponent controls more creatures than you, create three 1/1 white creature tokens. If an opponent has more life than you, you gain 5 life. If an opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw a card.
